title: Media Coverage
description: Our farmland investment platform has been featured in leading media outlets for our innovative approach to sustainable agriculture and transparent investment practices.

newsArticles.title: Farmland Investment Platform Raises â‚¹50 Crores in Series A Funding
newsArticles.summary: Leading farmland investment platform secures significant funding to expand operations across India and enhance technology infrastructure.

newsArticles.title: Sustainable Agriculture: The Future of Farmland Investment
newsArticles.summary: How innovative farming practices are attracting urban investors to agricultural investments with guaranteed returns.

newsArticles.title: Tech-Enabled Farming Transforms Rural Livelihoods
newsArticles.summary: Digital platform connects urban investors with rural farmers, creating win-win opportunities for sustainable agriculture.

newsArticles.title: Organic Farming Certification Reaches 100% Across Portfolio
newsArticles.summary: Platform achieves milestone of 100% organic certification across all managed farmlands, setting new industry standards.

pressReleases.title: Partnership with Leading Agricultural Universities Announced
pressReleases.content: Strategic partnerships with top agricultural universities to drive research and innovation in sustainable farming practices.

pressReleases.title: Expansion to 5 New States Completed
pressReleases.content: Platform expands operations to Rajasthan, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Odisha, and West Bengal, bringing total coverage to 15 states.

pressReleases.title: Launch of Mobile App for Real-Time Farm Monitoring
pressReleases.content: New mobile application enables investors to monitor their farms in real-time with IoT sensors and satellite imagery.
